children.value: hasOwnProperty checks properties on current object

props.code:
function Bird(name) {
  this.name = name;  //own property
}

Bird.prototype.numLegs = 2; // prototype property
b = new Bird()
b.hasOwnProperty('name') // true
b.hasOwnProperty('numLegs') // false
'name' in b // true
'numLegs' in b // true

children.value:
function Bird(name) {
  this.name = name;  //own property
}

Bird.prototype.numLegs = 2; // prototype property
b = new Bird()
b.hasOwnProperty('name') // true
b.hasOwnProperty('numLegs') // false
